article.title: CACI to Support C4 Systems Directorate
article.text: CACI Incorporated-Federal, Chantilly, Virginia, is being awarded a $9,423,610 modification under a previously awarded indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract (N00033-09-D-6503) with firm-fixed-price and/or firm-fixed-price level-of-effort task orders for systems development support services in support of Military Sealift Command’s Command, Control, Communications, and Computer (C4) Systems directorate. The U.S. Navy’s Military Sealift Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity (N00033-09-D-6503).
